column2:
"Challenge the new difficulty level.
Though you might been used to it,
things are different this time."

"The movements of the super hard
hostiles will be different from those
that you have experienced before."

"However, we cannot run just because
we are afraid. Instead, we should clear
and break through this challenge."

"I only need one thing from you. That is
to clear this super hard Time Attack
quest."

"You were requested because we think
you can do it. I recommended you too.
Now, good luck and do your best."
